items.name: White Soul
items.desk: The White Soul falls from the monsters. You can use it to improve your equipment.

items.name: Health potion
items.desk: Health potion restores 20% the max health reserve.

items.name: Mana potion
items.desk: Mana potion restores 20% the max mana reserve.

items.name: Bomb
items.desk: Setting aside the bomb, an explosion will occur in 5 seconds.
